1.0.0.name: wordpress/enhanced-linking
1.0.0.description: Once Enhanced Linking is installed, users will notice two new options; ability to add links from related articles and ability to search the web right from the window. This will let users find relevant fresh content from other bloggers and allow them to find anything on the web in a quick and easy fashion.
